sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Calendar, GraduationCap, Award, Phone, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; import './Doctors.css'; const Doctors = () => { const doctors = [ { id: 1, name: 'Dr. Thomas Varghese', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1612349317150-e413f6a5b16d?w=400&h=400&fit=crop', designation: 'Chief Medical Officer & Senior Consultant', specialization: 'Cataract Surgery, Glaucoma', qualifications: 'MS (Ophthalmology), FRCS (Edinburgh)', experience: '28 years', languages: 'English, Malayalam, Hindi', bio: `Dr. Thomas Varghese is the founding Chief Medical Officer of MOSCMM Kariambady Eye Hospital. With over 28 years of experience in ophthalmology, he has performed more than 15,000 cataract surgeries and is recognized for his expertise in glaucoma management. He completed his MS in Ophthalmology from the prestigious Armed Forces Medical College, Pune, and later obtained his FRCS from Edinburgh. Dr. Varghese is deeply committed to the hospital's charitable mission and personally oversees the community outreach programs.`, achievements: [ 'Performed over 15,000 successful cataract surgeries', 'Pioneer of SICS technique in Wayanad region', 'Kerala State Award for Community Eye Care Services (2015)', 'Conducted over 150 free eye camps in tribal areas' ] }, { id: 2, name: 'Dr. Mary Philip', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559839734-2b71ea197ec2?w=400&h=400&fit=crop', designation: 'Consultant Ophthalmologist', specialization: 'General Ophthalmology, Pediatric Eye Care', qualifications: 'MBBS, DO, DNB (Ophthalmology)', experience: '18 years', languages: 'English, Malayalam', bio: `Dr. Mary Philip is a compassionate ophthalmologist with special expertise in pediatric eye care. She completed her DNB in Ophthalmology from Sankara Nethralaya, Chennai, one of India's premier eye care institutions. Her gentle approach makes her especially popular among children and elderly patients. Dr. Philip is passionate about school eye screening programs and has helped identify and treat vision problems in thousands of children across Wayanad.`, achievements: [ 'Established pediatric eye care unit at the hospital', 'Screened over 25,000 school children for vision problems', 'Published research on childhood amblyopia in tribal populations', 'Trained in advanced squint surgery techniques' ] }, { id: 3, name: 'Dr. John Mathew', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1537368910025-700350fe46c7?w=400&h=400&fit=crop', designation: 'Consultant - Retina Specialist', specialization: 'Medical and Surgical Retina', qualifications: 'MS (Ophthalmology), DNB, FVRS', experience: '15 years', languages: 'English, Malayalam, Tamil', bio: `Dr. John Mathew is a fellowship-trained vitreoretinal surgeon specializing in diabetic retinopathy, macular degeneration, and retinal detachment surgeries. He completed his FVRS (Fellowship in Vitreoretinal Surgery) from Aravind Eye Hospital, Madurai. With the high prevalence of diabetes in the region, his expertise in diabetic eye disease has been invaluable to the community. Dr. Mathew introduced OCT imaging and intravitreal injection therapy at the hospital.`, achievements: [ 'Introduced vitreoretinal surgery services to Wayanad', 'Performed over 3,000 intravitreal injections', 'Established diabetic retinopathy screening program', 'Research on diabetic retinopathy prevalence in tribal populations' ] }, { id: 4, name: 'Dr. Sarah Abraham', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1594824476967-48c8b964273f?w=400&h=400&fit=crop', designation: 'Consultant Ophthalmologist', specialization: 'Cornea, Contact Lenses, Refractive Surgery', qualifications: 'MBBS, MS (Ophthalmology), FICO', experience: '12 years', languages: 'English, Malayalam', bio: `Dr. Sarah Abraham specializes in corneal diseases and contact lens fitting. She obtained her Fellowship from the International Council of Ophthalmology (FICO) with a focus on anterior segment diseases. She manages the contact lens clinic and provides expert care for various corneal conditions including keratoconus and corneal infections. Dr. Abraham is also trained in refractive surgery evaluation and post-operative care.`, achievements: [ 'Established the Contact Lens Clinic', 'Expertise in managing complex corneal cases', 'Trained in specialized contact lens fitting for keratoconus', 'Instrumental in setting up the hospital\'s optical shop' ] }, { id: 5, name: 'Dr. George Kurien', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1622253692010-333f2da6031d?w=400&h=400&fit=crop', designation: 'Junior Consultant', specialization: 'General Ophthalmology, Cataract Surgery', qualifications: 'MBBS, MS (Ophthalmology)', experience: '5 years', languages: 'English, Malayalam, Hindi', bio: `Dr. George Kurien is a young and dedicated ophthalmologist who joined MOSCMM Kariambady Eye Hospital with a passion for community service. He completed his MS in Ophthalmology from Government Medical College, Kottayam, and is being trained in advanced phacoemulsification by the senior consultants. Dr. Kurien is enthusiastic about leveraging technology for better patient care and actively manages the hospital's telemedicine initiatives.`, achievements: [ 'Led the implementation of digital health records', 'Active participant in community eye camps', 'Developed patient education materials in local languages', 'Spearheading telemedicine follow-up services' ] } ]; return (
{/* Page Header */}

Our Doctors

Meet our team of experienced and compassionate eye care specialists

Home / Our Doctors
{/* Doctors Introduction */}
Our Medical Team

Experienced Specialists Dedicated to Your Eye Health

Our team of qualified ophthalmologists brings together decades of combined experience in various eye care specialties. Each doctor is committed to the hospital's mission of providing compassionate, quality care to all patients.

{/* Doctors Profiles */}
{doctors.map((doctor, index) => (
{doctor.experience} Experience

{doctor.name}

{doctor.designation}

{doctor.qualifications}
{doctor.specialization}

{doctor.bio}

Key Achievements:

    {doctor.achievements.map((achievement, idx) => (

    • ))}

Languages: {doctor.languages}

Book Appointment
))}
{/* Support Staff */}

Our Support Team

Behind our doctors is a dedicated team of nurses, optometrists, technicians, and administrative staff who ensure smooth operations and excellent patient care.

Schedule a Consultation with Our Specialists

Our doctors are available for consultations Monday through Saturday. Book your appointment today for expert eye care.

Book Appointment Call: +91 4936 202030
); }; export default Doctors;
